div.l: Myn herte is broken help I am but ded
He lith vp on my wombe ⁊and on my hed
Help symkyn for the fals clerkes fight
¶ This Iohn sterte vp as faste as he myght
And grasped bi the walles to ⁊and fro
To fynde a staf ⁊and sheo sturt vp also
And knewe the estres bet then dude Iohn
And bi the wal sheo tok a staf a non
And say a lytell shynyng of a light
For in at an hole shon the mone bright
And bi that light sheo say hem bothe two
But sykerly sheo nyste who was ho
And as sheo say a white thyng in hur eye
Anon sheo can hit sikurly aspye
Sheo wende the clerk had had a volupere
And the staf sheo drough ay nere ⁊and nere
And wende haue hit Aleyne on the poll
And smot the myller on the pylled skoll
That doıı̄un he goth ⁊and cryed a rowt I dye
¶ This clerkes bete him wel ⁊and let him lye
And greythed hem ⁊and tok hur hors a non
And eke hur mele ⁊and on hur wey thei gon
And at the mylle dore thei toke the cake
Of half a busshell flour wel y bake
Thus is the proude myller wel y bete
And hath lost the gryndyng of the whete
And payed for the soper euery dell
Of Aleyne ⁊and of Iohn ⁊and beten him well
His wyf is swyfedswyfedswyfed ⁊and doughter als
Lo such hit is a myller to be fals
And ther to this ꝓprouerbe is seyd ful soth
Him dar not wene wel that Iuell doth
